item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-07
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Sonoma with her cone on is like a bull in a china shop. #
  • RT: Imagine explaining appetizers to people in a third world country that are starving. "No it's food we eat before food." (via @pafford) #
  • Our database keeps growing! We now have over 1500 series, 690 authors, and 8000 books! Keep those series suggestions coming! (via @fictfact) #
  • from @xentek - Nginx: From Russia With Love #

Powered by Twitter Tools
